entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Sundre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sundre Airport 7:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to periods of light snow this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
